detailed_notes: Image depicts an external street view of a residential building and parked cars. No interior room details available for condition or size estimation.
This image shows an outdoor parking lot area and adjacent residential buildings with no indoor room details available for inspection or renovation assessment.

Bathroom is small and compact with no visible windows, which may cause ventilation and humidity issues as only a harsh vent is present. Tiles on walls are intact but dated; red tiles appear vibrant though design is somewhat inconsistent. The bathtub, toilet, and fixtures show signs of wear and age but appear functional. Shower curtain rod is installed but the curtain might need replacement. Clean and maintain plumbing fixtures, consider upgrading ventilator and adding window or mechanical ventilation for improved air circulation.

The balcony is narrow and long, measuring approximately 3.5m by 1m. The tiled floor is in good condition but slightly dated. Walls and ceiling show signs of age and some minor staining or dirt, suggesting repainting is advisable. Windows and frames appear functional but could benefit from cleaning and some minor maintenance. The door and the rolling shutter mechanism are intact but slightly aged. No visible electrical wiring concerns, but limited electrical fittings. Overall renovation may focus on fresh paint, window maintenance, and potentially upgrading the ceiling for improved aesthetics.

The room is empty with parquet flooring in good condition and a well-maintained ceiling. The wallpaper on one wall is in good condition but the other walls appear to have outdated or peeling paint that needs refreshing. The door is in good condition. There are no visible windows in the image, indicating a potential lack of natural light or the window is out of view. No built-in wardrobes or light fixtures are visible, indicating these elements need installation or replacement. Electrical outlets are present but may require updating. Overall a renovation focused on improving walls, adding wardrobes or fixtures, and confirming window presence is recommended.

Kitchen has an outdated style with older cabinetry and countertops. Cabinets and countertops are usable but dated and may benefit from replacement for modern aesthetics and functionality. Walls and paint show signs of age and could be refreshed. Flooring and ceiling are in better condition but minor updates could improve the look. Plumbing fixtures and appliances (sink and stove) appear functional but are older models, consider upgrading for better efficiency. Windows are in fair shape and provide good natural light, door frames and doors are functionally sound. Overall, moderate renovation required focusing on cabinetry, surfaces, and potential plumbing/electrical upgrades to modernize.

The hallway has dated flooring with visible wear and requires refinishing or replacement. Wallpaper on one side is somewhat outdated and may need removal or replacement. Walls show minor stains and marks needing repainting. Ceilings are in good condition but paint touch-ups may be needed. Doors and their frames look structurally sound but the paint peeling suggests refinishing. There are no windows in the hallway which limits natural light. Lighting fixture is modern and functional. Built-in storage on the left appears usable but paint should be refreshed. No visible plumbing in this area.

Walls show visible patches and marks, possibly from previously removed fixtures or furniture, requiring repainting or wallpaper replacement. Flooring is parquet and generally in good condition but may need minor polishing. Ceiling looks intact with no visible damage. The room lacks windows visible in the photo, limiting natural light. Electrical outlets are visible but old and may require updating. There are no built-in wardrobes; the door is functional but simple. The condition of light fixtures and radiators is not clear but light fixture wiring appears outdated. Overall, a repaint and electrical update plus installation of lighting fixtures or wardrobes would improve the room.

The room is small and shows signs of wear. The wooden parquet flooring is worn and would benefit from sanding and refinishing. Walls have multiple marks and stains and need repainting. The ceiling is in fair condition with some discoloration but no visible damage. The window is intact and functional but window dressings should be updated. The door is serviceable with minor wear. Exposed wiring near the floor corner suggests electrical updates or tidying should be considered. The light fixture is basic and could be modernized. Overall, the room requires mostly cosmetic work and updating to improve aesthetics and functionality.
Image shows an urban street view with parked cars and residential buildings. Not an indoor room; no room-specific renovation assessment applicable.
This is a floor plan of a residential unit, showing layout and room measurements. No direct visual condition data available for renovation cost assessment.

The balcony space is enclosed with multiple windows that appear in good condition. The flooring shows some dirt and wear but seems intact. Ceiling and walls are discolored in some areas and may benefit from repainting and cleaning, especially due to visible mold or dirt spots near the ceiling corner. Some electrical fixtures exist but may need updating or better concealment of wiring. The small built-in shelf and tiled area are functional but dated, requiring minor upgrades or deep cleaning. Overall, minor renovations and thorough cleaning are recommended to improve aesthetics and avoid mold/spots from worsening.

The hallway is narrow with approximately 4 meters long and 1 meter wide. The wooden parquet flooring is in good condition but could benefit from refinishing for an updated look. The ceiling is intact and the light fixture is functional but outdated. Walls show some wear with peeling or discolored paint and some wall coverings that seem aged; repainting or wallpaper replacement is recommended. Doors are in functional condition with minor aesthetic wear. No windows are present in the hallway. Electrical outlets and wiring appear safe and functional but upgrading fixtures could improve lighting aesthetics. The hallway includes built-in storage doors that seem functional; no plumbing is required in this area.

The room shows wear and tear primarily on the walls where the paint is stained and uneven, suggesting the need for repainting. The floor parquet has visible damage at edges but remains mostly intact; sanding and refinishing might suffice. The ceiling is in good condition with no visible cracks or moisture. Windows and door appear functional with minor aging but no urgent repairs needed. Electrical wiring and outlets seem basic; the light fixture is a bare bulb and would benefit from upgrading. Built-in wardrobe or light fixtures are not present but wall sockets and radiator exist, rated average condition. Overall, moderate renovation focused on painting, floor restoration, and electrical improvements recommended.
Image shows an exterior street view with multiple apartment buildings and parked cars. No interior room to assess for renovation.

No visible windows in this image, so windows likely need inspection or installation. Walls show signs of wear, stains, and patches, requiring thorough repainting or repairs. Flooring parquet is in fair condition but might benefit from refinishing. Ceiling seems intact but basic. Door appears functional but outdated. Electrical fixtures like the hanging lamp exist but electrical sockets and wiring need checking. No built-in wardrobes or significant furniture noted, so light fixtures and typical bedroom fittings are limited.

The balcony area is narrow but long. Floor tiles are relatively intact but show signs of aging and minor dirt accumulation. Ceilings and walls have noticeable discoloration and potential water stains; repainting and some repair recommended. Windows appear functional but might need maintenance for proper sealing and smooth operation due to older aluminum frames and potential wear. Doors have visible signs of wear and paint chipping. Electrical fixture (fluorescent light) is outdated and may require replacement for better lighting and energy efficiency. Overall, the balcony needs surface refurbishment and minor repairs to improve functionality and aesthetics.

This image shows the facade of a residential building with multiple balconies and windows. The exterior paint appears weathered and somewhat outdated. Some balconies show signs of wear such as rust or discoloration on metal elements. Window frames and roller shutters seem older but functional. No visible structural damage, but a refresh of paint and some maintenance on balcony railings and external surfaces is recommended to improve appearance and durability.

Bathroom is overall in good condition with no visible damage. Floor and wall tiles appear intact and relatively modern, though style may be slightly dated. No windows present, which could impact ventilationâ€”consider adding mechanical ventilation if not installed. Plumbing fixtures (toilet, bidet, sink) look functional but could be updated for a fresher appearance. Door and ceiling are well-maintained. Electrical outlet near mirror is visible and appears in good condition. No visible mold or water damage. Recommend updating plumbing fixtures and improving ventilation for comfort and modern standards.

The room lacks windows which severely impacts natural lighting and ventilation, recommending installation if possible. Walls have visible stains and dirt, requiring thorough cleaning and repainting. The parquet floor is in decent condition but might benefit from refinishing. The ceiling and door are in acceptable condition. Electrical fittings are minimal with a bare bulb, suggesting an upgrade to lighting fixtures and checks on wiring. The corner wardrobe is old and damaged, suggesting replacement. Overall, moderate renovation is needed focused on lighting, painting, and furniture replacement.

The image shows an outdoor street view with buildings, sidewalks, parked cars, and a pedestrian crossing. It is not an interior room and therefore cannot be assessed for renovation costs related to interior spaces.

Walls have visible stains, scuffs, and possible water damage areas that require cleaning and repainting. The wooden floor is generally in good condition but could benefit from polishing or minor repairs. The ceiling is intact and without major problems. The door and window frames are functional but dated, possibly needing refinishing or replacement. Electrical outlets and lighting fixtures are limited and might need updating for modern standards. No windows visible in the room itself, only the open doorway; this may affect natural light and ventilation. Overall, the room requires moderate renovation primarily focused on wall and electrical improvements.

The kitchen is small and quite outdated with evident wear. The flooring is somewhat worn but intact. Walls have old paint and tiled backsplash in partial need of replacement. The stove and extraction system appear old and likely require replacement. Plumbing fixtures are outdated. Electrical wiring is exposed and must be rectified for safety compliance. The door and window are in reasonable condition, but overall renovation for a modern aesthetic and functional upgrade is strongly recommended.

The room has parquet flooring with visible wear and shine loss, suggesting refinishing or partial replacement. The wallpaper on one wall is somewhat dated and could be removed or updated. Walls and ceiling are in decent shape but would benefit from repainting. The sliding door and window appear functional but the door frame area shows minor discoloration and needs cleaning or repainting. Electrical fixtures and sockets appear modern and functional. Built-in fixtures are minimal, with no wardrobes or radiators visible in the image.

The bathroom is small, approximately 3.5 m2. The overall condition is somewhat outdated but functional. The floor tiles are in good condition, and the ceiling appears well-maintained. The walls are mostly tiled white with a section in red tile that looks dated but intact. There are no visible windows, indicating poor ventilation and natural light, which could be a concern for mold and air quality. The door is functional but shows typical wear. Plumbing fixtures including the sink, faucet, and bathtub appear useable but are old and could be upgraded for better aesthetics and efficiency. Electrical outlets and lighting are sufficient but could be modernized. Renovation is recommended to update fixtures, improve lighting and ventilation, and refresh wall tiles to enhance the overall bathroom quality.

Flooring is generally in good shape with minor wear. Walls show visible patches and marks indicating a need for repainting. Ceiling is in fair condition but could use freshening up. The wardrobe is damaged or partially dismantled and requires repair or replacement. Window and frame appear old and may need upgrading for better insulation and security. Electrical fittings seem functional but only a bare bulb is present, suggesting upgrade of lighting fixtures. Overall room needs cosmetic renovation and some fixtures replaced.

The balcony is narrow and enclosed with sliding glass windows in good condition. Flooring tiles and wall paint show signs of aging and mild staining, suggesting repainting and floor refurbishing needed. Ceilings have discoloration and minor damage likely due to moisture exposure, requiring repair and repainting. Electrical installation appears functional but outdated, may need updating. No visible plumbing. Door and window frames are serviceable but could use maintenance to improve sealing and insulation.

The image shows an outdoor parking area and an apartment building with multiple floors. As this is an exterior view and not an interior room, there is no relevant internal renovation assessment to provide.

The kitchen is small and outdated, with old cabinetry and countertops showing visible wear and discoloration. The sink and plumbing system appear aged and may require replacement or major repairs. The stove looks old and likely inefficient. The flooring is worn but intact. Walls have some dirt and patches that suggest repainting is needed. The ceiling is in reasonably good shape. Windows are functional but could benefit from maintenance or upgrades for better insulation. Electrical outlets and lighting look basic, may need updating for safety and functionality.
